EmailTemplate.name: 202103_Americas_BGA_Operators_Conference_EN-1.Webinar_Invite_All_Sessions
EmailTemplate.subject: 2021 Operators Conference Webinar, March 10-11
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Conferencia de Operadores Virtual - Español
Honeywell le hace una cordial invitación para participar en su sesión virtual dirigida a Operadores de Aviación Ejecutiva donde se presentará lo más reciente en actualizaciones técnicas de motores y APU así como actualizaciones en sistemas aviónicos, se abarcará también temas de operaciones de vuelo para la comunidad de pilotos.
FECHA Marzo 10, 2021
HORA 9:00AM MST 10:00AM MX 12:00PM CO
SITIO En línea y Bajo demanda
REGISTRESE AQUI <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2021/03/bga-webinar-ops-conference-espanol]]>
Virtual Operators Conference - English
Honeywell would like to invite you to attend the Business Aviation Webinar sessions where we will be discussing the latest on technical updates on propulsion and avionics programs, as well as operational items for the pilot community.
DATE March 10, 2021 (MST) March 11, 2021 (MYT+AEDT)
TIME 6:00PM MST 9:00AM MYT 11:00AM AEDT
LOCATION Online and On-Demand
REGISTER HERE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2021/03/bga-webinar-ops-conference-english-pm-apac]]>
Virtual Operators Conference - English
Honeywell would like to invite you to attend the Business Aviation Webinar sessions where we will be discussing the latest on technical updates on propulsion and avionics programs, as well as operational items for the pilot community.
DATE March 11, 2021
TIME 1:00AM MST 8:00AM GMT 9:00AM CET 12:00PM GST
LOCATION Online and On-Demand
REGISTER HERE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2021/03/bga-webinar-ops-conference-english]]>
Conferência de Operadores Virtual - Português
Honeywell te convida a participar do nosso Business Aviation Webinar, quando iremos discutir as mais novas atualizações técnicas relacionadas aos programas de motores e de aviônicos, assim como temas operacionais para tripulantes. DATA Março 11, 2021
TEMPO 7:00AM MST 11:00AM Saõ Paulo
LOCAL Online e Sob demanda
REGISTRE-SE AQUI <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2021/03/bga-webinar-ops-conference-portugues]]>
